mapper.insert: insert into schedule (schedule_location, schedule_lat, schedule_lon, schedule_memo, plan_idx, schedule_order) values(#{scheduleLocation}, #{scheduleLat}, #{scheduleLon}, #{scheduleMemo}, #{planIdx}, #{scheduleOrder})
mapper.select: select ifnull(max(schedule_order),0) from schedule where plan_idx = #{planIdx}
select schedule_idx, schedule_location, schedule_lat, schedule_lon, schedule_memo, plan_idx, schedule_order from schedule order by schedule_idx desc
mapper.update: update schedule set schedule_location=#{scheduleLocation}, schedule_lat=#{scheduleLat}, schedule_lon=#{scheduleLon}, schedule_memo=#{scheduleMemo}, schedule_order=#{scheduleOrder} where schedule_idx=#{scheduleIdx}
